name: Hoppip
flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

previous.name: Politoed
previous.flavorText:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

next.name: Skiploom
next.flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

pokemon.name: Hoppip
pokemon.flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

pokemon.name: Skiploom
pokemon.flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

pokemon.name: Jumpluff
pokemon.flavorText:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.
